articles.description: THE BEATLES remain one of the biggest bands of all time despite putting and end to their reign as the Fab Four 50 years ago, but are you ready to put your knowledge to the test in our ultimate Beatles quiz?

articles.author: Sophie Grubb
articles.title: Ellie Goulding crashes Bristol nurse's online wedding with surprise serenade - Bristol Post
articles.description: The couple had to postpone their real wedding due to the coronavirus restrictions
articles.content:
Pop star Ellie Goulding shocked a Bristol bride and groom when she popped up for a surprise serenade at their online wedding.
NHS nurse Hayley Pitman and her fiancé Harvey Skelton had to postpone their dream day due to the coronavirus lockdown, and instead l… [+2184 chars]

articles.author: Ellie Harrison
articles.title: 'I was wiped': Tom Hanks details his battle with coronavirus in hospital - The Independent
articles.description: Actor said the ‘weirdest thing’ happened while in isolation
articles.content:
Tom Hanks has detailed what it was like being in hospital with coronavirus.
The actor and his wife Rita Wilson tested positive for Covid-19 in March. They were in Australia at the time, where Hanks was filming Baz Luhrmanns biopic on Elvis Presley.
Speaking… [+1284 chars]

articles.title: Dan Walker: BBC host defends interviewing style after being compared to GMB's Piers Morgan - Express
articles.description: DAN WALKER, BBC Breakfast host alongside Louise Minchin, has defended his interviewing style to a fan after they compared the BBC to Good Morning Britain host, Piers Morgan.
articles.content:
Known for being mild-mannered and keeping his head during heated debates, Dan has gained a reputation for being a friendly presenter.
And that's not a bad characteristic to have, by all means.
With this in mind, he's constantly compared to that of outspoken… [+1746 chars]

articles.title: Lucifer: Tom Ellis leaves season 6 in jeopardy after 'stalled' contract talks - Express
articles.description: LUCIFER's production has been stalled by the coronavirus pandemic, but dedicated fans are still eagerly awaiting the season five premiere.
